== Feroke (CT) (627439) ==

Feroke (CT) is a town in the [[Kozhikode]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 7.6 sq. km. and harbouring 6716 households with total population of 32122 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 13 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 412 km. Male population is 15596 and female population is 16526. Scheduled Caste population is 2710 and Scheduled Tribes population is 47. Census Location Code of the town is 627439<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 13 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 13 km. Railway station is at Feroke at a distance of 0 km.
